page.title: 04I.C.I.WILTON
page.content: I.C.I Wilton produces petrochemicals for markets around the world with raw materials(e.g oil)from the North Sea, and our area actually contains 6 Olefines plants(producing products from natural ethanol),and the HQ and research sections. I.C.I Wilton has been hit by the recession,as have many other businesses,and a number of jobs have had to go to maintain I.C.I's profitability,essential for a private company with little if any government backing. The plants work in conjunction with the other I.C.I plants in Britain and Europe,most of which are also concerned with petrochemicals.
